posts.post_content: This guy is quite something. His body is powerful, he helps you get hellbent, and he's brutal once you've got no cards in hand (i.e. "Tap: [Coercion](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Coercion)"). Also works well if you haven't got any important cards in your hand anyway.

Posted By: blurrymadness (5/17/2011 10:52:39 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
3/2 First Strike is already a nicely priced creature. If you have low hand size (which all Rakdos or aggressive deck often are) the ability is very much one-sided against your opponent. Even if you have to discard you can design your deck around cards with madness or creatures that come back (like Bloodghast). Adding Cursed Scroll, you will utilize the power even more.  
  
All in all, a delicate creature with a lot of uses and very powerful in the right deck.  
  
4/5
posts.html:
3/2 First Strike is already a nicely priced creature. If you have low hand size (which all Rakdos or aggressive deck often are) the ability is very much one-sided against your opponent. Even if you have to discard you can design your deck around cards with madness or creatures that come back (like Bloodghast). Adding Cursed Scroll, you will utilize the power even more.

All in all, a delicate creature with a lot of uses and very powerful in the right deck.

4/5
